llm_command:
kubectl apply -n frontend -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: frontend-allow-communication
  namespace: frontend
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: adservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 9555
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: cartservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 7070
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: checkoutservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 5050
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: currencyservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 7000
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: productcatalogservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 3550
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: recommendationservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 8080
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: shippingservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 50051
EOF

items: []
kind: List
metadata:
